Name: Threat Assessment Policy for Brute Force Attack by Password Hacking on Smart Key Lock
Policy: OPTIONAL{                        ?loc rdf:type ssso:Location.                        ?cl rdf:type ssso:Classification_Level.                        ?eq ssso:hasContext ?loc.                        ?loc ssso:hasPolicy ?cl.                        FILTER (?cl IN (ssso:Classified)).                        BIND (?cl AS ?con1).                    }.                    OPTIONAL{                        ?loc rdf:type ssso:Location.                        ?cl rdf:type ssso:Classification_Level.                        ?eq ssso:hasContext ?loc.                        ?loc ssso:hasPolicy ?cl.                        FILTER (?cl IN (ssso:Normal)).                        BIND (?cl AS ?con2).                    }.                    OPTIONAL{                        ?loc rdf:type ssso:Location.                        ?cl rdf:type ssso:Classification_Level.                        ?eq ssso:hasContext ?loc.                        ?loc ssso:hasPolicy ?cl.                        FILTER (?cl IN (ssso:Public)).                        BIND (?cl AS ?con3).                    }.                BIND (COALESCE(                IF(BOUND(?con1), ssso:TL-2, 0/0),                IF(BOUND(?con2), ssso:TL-2, 0/0),                IF(BOUND(?con3), ssso:TL-1, 0/0),                ssso:TL-2) AS ?Threat_Level)
Description: Classified -> TL-2 Normal -> TL-2 Public -> TL-1 Otherwise -> TL-2
